items.title: Magictools
items.content_text:
### Engines and Frameworks / Voxel Editors

*   :tada: [PyGame-CE](https://pyga.me/docs/index.html) - Pygame - Community Edition is a FOSS Python library for multimedia applications (like games). Built on top of the excellent SDL library

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

*   [Ollama](https://ollama.com/) - Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 3, and other large language models. ([Source Code (‚≠ê146k)](https://github.com/ollama/ollama)) `MIT` `Docker/Python`
*   [Open-WebUI](https://openwebui.com) - User-friendly AI Interface, supports Ollama, OpenAI API. ([Source Code (‚≠ê102k)](https://github.com/open-webui/open-webui)) `BSD-3-Clause` `Docker/Python`
*   [Perplexica (‚≠ê23k)](https://github.com/ItzCrazyKns/Perplexica) - AI-powered search engine (alternative to Perplexity AI). `MIT` `Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Generative Artificial Intelligence (GenAI)

  • Ollama - Get up and running with Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1, Phi-4, Gemma 3, and other large language models. (Source Code (‚≠ê146k)) MIT Docker/Python
  • Open-WebUI - User-friendly AI Interface, supports Ollama, OpenAI API. (Source Code (‚≠ê102k)) BSD-3-Clause Docker/Python
  • Perplexica (‚≠ê23k) - AI-powered search engine (alternative to Perplexity AI). MIT Docker

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Tools / Misc

*   [Agentic Radar (‚≠ê623)](https://github.com/splx-ai/agentic-radar) -  Open-source CLI security scanner for agentic workflows. Scans your workflow‚Äôs source code, detects vulnerabilities, and generates an interactive visualization along with a detailed security report. Supports LangGraph, CrewAI, n8n, OpenAI Agents, and more.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Low-code Platform

*   [manubes](https://www.manubes.com) - Powerful no-code cloud platform with a focus on industrial production management. Free for one user with 1 million workflow activities a month ([also available in german](https://www.manubes.de)).
items.content_html:
Low-code Platform

  • manubes - Powerful no-code cloud platform with a focus on industrial production management. Free for one user with 1 million workflow activities a month (also available in german).

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Authentication / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [frontegg-angular (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/frontegg/frontegg-angular) - [Frontegg](https://frontegg.com) is a web platform where SaaS companies can set up their fully managed, scalable, and brand-aware SaaS features and integrate them into their SaaS portals in up to 5 lines of code. Quickly integrate Frontegg‚Äôs login box with this [quickstart guide](https://developers.frontegg.com/sdks/frontend/angular/hosted-login).

### SEO / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@unhead/angular](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@unhead/angular) - Full-stack `<head>` management for Angular applications.

### General / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [@klubinskak/ngx-smart-forms (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/klubinskak/ngx-smart-forms) - Smart, Signal-powered form state utilities for Angular 17+.

### Material Based / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [c3-components (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/c3ulnta0rk/c3-components) - An open-source component library that extends the `@angular/material` library.
